channel.title: Projects on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Portfolio

item.title: Image Processing App with NextJS, Spring Boot & Google Cloud Vision API
item.description: I wanted to try something new other than web app with CRUD operations. And needed to learn how to deploy multiple Spring Boot apps on GCP (which could be useful for microservices) and, at the same time, learn about Cloud Vision API.

item.title: Admin Page for the Restaurant Web App with Next.js and Spring Boot
item.description: This article will focus on what the admin users can do on the Restaurant Web App. For demo, please use these credentials to login. username - bruce password - iambatman

item.title: Building a Restaurant Web App with Next.js and Spring Boot 3
item.description: Embarking on a journey through the digital culinary landscape, I present to you a showcase of innovation and flavorâ€”my Next.js restaurant web app. This project seamlessly marries the frontend prowess of Next.
